concept.title: Trim and Extend Chamfered Objects
concept.shortdesc: If the objects to chamfer are two intersecting lines, and you select the Trim option to chamfer objects, the system automatically trims lines to the endpoint of the chamfered line. If the selected lines are not intersecting with each other, the systemextends themto get intersectant.

conbody.p: If you select No Trim, the systemcreates chamfer directly and not to trim.
